issues.message: Consider using more general type 'System.Collections.Immutable.IImmutableSet<Akka.Cluster.UniqueAddress>' instead of 'System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableHashSet<Akka.Cluster.UniqueAddress>'.
Consider using more general type 'System.Collections.Immutable.IImmutableSet<string>' instead of 'System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableHashSet<string>'.
Consider using more general type 'System.IEquatable<Akka.Actor.Address>' instead of 'Akka.Actor.Address'.
Consider using more general type 'System.Collections.Immutable.IImmutableSet<Akka.Cluster.UniqueAddress>' instead of 'System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableHashSet<Akka.Cluster.UniqueAddress>'.
Consider using more general type 'System.Collections.Generic.IList<Akka.Cluster.UniqueAddress>' instead of 'System.Collections.Generic.List<Akka.Cluster.UniqueAddress>'.
Consider using more general type 'System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<T, int>' instead of 'System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<T, int>'.
Consider using more general type 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Akka.Cluster.Member>' instead of 'System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableSortedSet<Akka.Cluster.Member>'.
Consider using more general type 'System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Akka.Cluster.Member>' instead of 'System.Collections.Immutable.ImmutableSortedSet<Akka.Cluster.Member>'.
